LoginDescription: Welcome back to your trusted legal companion. We're here to assist you every step of the way. Please enter your credentials to access your personalized legal services.

EmpowerDescription: Connect with Experienced Lawyers Instantly for Efficient and Convenient Consultations. Get legal help anytime, anywhere, right from the comfort of your phone, Schedule appointments based on your availability and connect with the right consultant. Add funds to your wallet and pay for legal services seamlessly.
FeaturesOne: Connect with our pool of experienced lawyers , specializedin various practice areas, for reliable and timely legal advice.
FeaturesTwo: Enjoy seamless transactions with our integrated wallet system, ensuring secure and convenient payment for your consultations.
FeaturesThree: Engage in call or vide sessions with our legal consultants, providing you with flexibility and personalised attention.
FeaturesFour: Rest assured that your sensitive information and legal matters are treated with the utmost confidentiality and protected by robust security measures.
FeaturesFive: Enjoy a seamless and intuitive user experience, designed to make navigating the app and accessing legal services effortless.
FeaturesSix: Access our app anytime, anywhere, empowering you to address leagl matters wherever you are.
WeProvideLegalConsultations: We provide legal consultations in all sectors
LawyerLanFiveDescription: we heve the felxibility to select your prefered method of communication during the consultation process
Header_content: Tabseer is a platform established to mediate and provide legal services and legal consultations in accordance with the relevant laws, regulations and instructions inside or outside the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. By using the Tabseer platform, you agree to abide by the provisions of this agreement without restrictions or conditions, and the Tabseer platform has the right at any time to amend this agreement. The amended version will be published on the platform, and the amended version of the (Terms and Conditions Agreement) will be effective one week after the date of its publication on the platform. After publication, your continued use of the platform will be considered your commitment to the terms and conditions contained in the amended version, and your satisfaction in applying the amendments and in the event that If you do not agree to the amendments, which may include adding, amending, or deleting conditions, the available solution is to stop using the platform, and any of the services that belong to you may be terminated, or the offering of the services may be stopped, or access to them or any part of them may be prevented at any time in the event of a violation of the terms and use policy.
Chapter_One_Header: The following terms, whenever mentioned in this agreement - the terms and conditions agreement - mean the following:
Chapter_One_One: is the client, lawyer, or arbitrator, whether in his personal capacity, an institutional entity, a company, or a body with a legal personality, or any person who uses the Tabseer platform to search for providers of legal and legal consulting services and benefit from their services, and who has an account on the platform, taking into account its terms and controls.
Chapter_One_Two: He is the person who offers his legal services in his own field according to his data registered on the platform and presented through the Tabseer platform.
Chapter_One_Three: Wherever mentioned in this agreement or in the privacy policy, it means “the Tabseer Legal Application, in both its versions, whether for the lawyer or for the user,” unless the context of the text has another meaning, affiliated with Dr. Fahd Al-Rifai and Partners Law Firm and Legal Consultations, based in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
Chapter_One_Four: It is the user’s page/record created in order for the user to be able to benefit from the services of the Tabseer platform.
Chapter_One_Five: These are all legal services available on the Tabseer platform.
Chapter_Two_Header: Chapter Two: Conditions for user registration on the Tabseer platform
Chapter_Two_One: He must have full capacity and be over 18 years old, and the user acknowledges that he has full capacity.
Chapter_Two_Two: The user is obligated to provide the Tabseer platform with the correct information and data required to benefit from the platform’s services.
Chapter_Two_Three: The User is prohibited from undertaking any action that may cause unbearable or disproportionate pressure on the Platform or its infrastructure.
Chapter_Two_Four: The User is prohibited from posting or uploading any defamatory, offensive, infringing, harmful, threatening, abusive, tortuous, racist, morally inappropriate or other unlawful content or information.
Chapter_Two_Five: The user is prohibited from entering or attempting unauthorized access to the platform or granting others the authority to use his account, or impersonating any identity or misrepresenting his membership with another person, and the user will bear the consequences of violating the provisions of this paragraph.
Chapter_Two_Six: The user is prohibited from doing anything that could cause harm or conflict with the intellectual property rights of the platform.
Chapter_Two_Seven: The user is prohibited from uploading or attaching any files, programs or any other materials protected by intellectual property rights laws or any private or public rights that he does not have the rights to use.
Chapter_Two_Eight: If the platform finds out, in its personal discretion, that the user has violated or violated any of these terms, it has the right to delete any requests or content published - without warning the user - and to take measures - including stopping, suspending or restricting the user’s access to the platform - and preventing the user from using the platform. The platform has the right to report the user to the Internet service providers or the competent authorities, or to take any legal measures.
Chapter_Two_Nine: When delegating or delegating a third party to him, the user is obligated to take official permission from the concerned parties and attach it to the platform for acceptance or rejection, and this does not free the delegate or client from responsibility in this regard.
Chapter_Two_Ten: The user acknowledges that the verification message sent to his mobile phone (the code) registered on the platform is considered an electronic signature that is approved for any action he takes on the platform. This is sufficient to verify login to the account used and that he must log out if not using the platform.
Chapter_Three_Header: Chapter Three: Provisions for benefiting from the services of the Tabseer platform
Chapter_Three_One: The role of the platform is limited to offering the services of service providers and mediating between the beneficiary user and service providers. The platform is not responsible for the level and quality of services provided by service providers.
Chapter_Three_Two: The services available on the platform are provided by service providers independent of the platform through a distinguished group of licensed lawyers, legal advisors, former judges, arbitrators, notaries, and those with professional specializations authorized to provide consultations in a specific field.
Chapter_Three_Three: The user can request the service he needs, and has the right to view the offers presented by service providers and choose from them what he wants, and he has the right to know the service implementation time and any details related to the services that he can agree on with the service provider, provided that all these details are in line with the terms and conditions agreement. of the user and the service provider.
Chapter_Three_Four: The user pays for the service through the payment methods available on the platform.
Chapter_Three_Five: The user is committed to all the terms and conditions of this agreement, and in the event that the user acts in violation of what is stated in this agreement, the platform has the right to disable his benefit from its services at any time without prior notice. The platform also has the right to resort to the competent authority to take all legal measures in this regard and to demand compensation from the user for any damage.
Chapter_Three_Six: The Tabseer platform does not request any confidential or private information or documents from the user, except for the requests mentioned in the platform or requested later through the platform. All requests related to providing the service are the responsibility of the service provider, and it is his sole responsibility to protect them and not disclose them.
Chapter_Four_One: The user adds legal service data or information about the advice he wishes to obtain by requesting the service through the platform.
Chapter_Four_Two: The user may add attachments and files related to the issue on which he wishes to obtain advice or be studied by the platform.
Chapter_Four_Three: The data and files of the required services and consultations that the user adds to the platform will be available to the platform administration and the service provider only, and no one of the platform users will be able to view them.
Chapter_Four_Four: Through the platform, we keep the request that the user submitted and the discussion that took place between the parties regarding the request. We also keep the date of opening and closing the request, the timing, and the amount of service provision.
Chapter_Five_One: The user must make payment through the payment methods available on the platform before the service provider starts providing the service.
Chapter_Five_Two: The user is prohibited from using a stolen or fraudulent credit card or any other payment method that does not belong to him, and the user acknowledges that he will bear the consequences of any use of unauthorized payment methods.
Chapter_Five_Three: The user is obligated to pay the service amount in Saudi riyals, and if he pays with a currency other than the Saudi riyal, the conversion fees will be borne by him.
Chapter_Five_Four: The user has the right to request a refund of the service amount before the service provider starts providing the service, and the user must submit the request to refund the service amount through the channels designated for that on the platform.
Chapter_Five_Five: If the user submits a request to cancel the service after the service provider has started providing the service, he is not entitled to any refund of the service amount, and the user is committed to pay the service amount in full.
Chapter_Five_Six: In the event that the platform detects any technical malfunction that prevents the user from benefitting from the service or that prevents the service provider from completing the provision of the service, the platform has the right to refund the user the service amount or keep it as a credit in his electronic wallet on the platform so that the user can benefit from it in obtaining any service provided through the platform.
Chapter_Six_One: The role of the platform is limited to offering the services of service providers and mediating between the beneficiary user and the service providers, and the platform does not bear any responsibility for the level or quality of the services provided by the service providers, and the user acknowledges that he understands that the platform is not responsible for this.
Chapter_Six_Two: The service provider bears the responsibility for the quality and level of the services that he provides to the user through the platform.
Chapter_Six_Three: The user acknowledges that he is solely responsible for any violations that he commits in the use of the platform or for any acts that violate the provisions of this agreement, and he will bear the legal consequences for his violations.
Chapter_Six_Four: The user is obligated to pay the amounts due for the services that he requests through the platform through the bank account designated by the platform for that purpose, and the user acknowledges that he will bear all expenses resulting from the use of any payment methods for the payment of the service amount.
Chapter_Six_Five: The user is obligated to provide all the documents that the service provider requests from him through the platform to complete the provision of the service that the user requested, and the user acknowledges that he will bear all the consequences of not providing the required documents, and the user’s violation of this paragraph may lead to stopping or delaying the provision of the service to him.
Chapter_Six_Six: The platform does not bear any responsibility for any errors, violations, or damage caused by the user or the service provider while using the platform or providing the services through the platform.
Chapter_Six_Seven: The platform is obligated to take all due diligence and quality supervision of the services provided through it, and the user acknowledges that he understands this.
Chapter_Seven_One: The platform has the right to suspend the user’s account or prevent him from accessing the platform if he violates any of the provisions of this agreement or if the platform deems that it is in its interest to do so.
Chapter_Seven_Two: The platform has the right to share the user's information with the competent authorities if the platform deems that it is in its interest to do so or if the competent authority requests the user's information.
Chapter_Eight_One: Any official correspondence addressed to the user will be sent to his official addresses registered on the platform, or through the notifications that the platform sends to the user through the channels that he chooses.
Chapter_Nine_Header: Chapter Nine: Litigation and Dispute Resolution
Chapter_Nine_One: The parties agree to resolve any disputes or disputes amicably through direct negotiations, and if it is not possible to resolve the disputes amicably within a period of fifteen working days from the date of the dispute, the parties agree that the applicable law in resolving the dispute is the Saudi law, and the Riyadh Court in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia is the competent authority to resolve any disputes that arise between the parties regarding the interpretation or implementation of the provisions of this agreement.
